thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Glenn Watson, Cyberdog Design
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Glenn Watson, Cyberdog Design

author: Glenn Watson, Cyberdog Design
title: Glenn Watson, Cyberdog Design
text: My corflute signs were available for collection with an overnight turnaround, earlier than stated and the quality was superb. The colours looked exactly as they did on my screen – bright and attractive – which is not always the case with printed material. I like using Easy Signs because of the online price calculator and the chat facility, which makes things so much easier right up front. And they are right across their products and the production processes, because you're dealing with a real Australian person at the factory.
